name: Gods Duel
description:
4 are the chosen gods but only one can be appointed to guide a new civilization. To decide who will be in charge of guiding these promising people, they have decided to face each other in duels.

Fight as avatars of the gods in duels where wisdom are the key to victory. Make use of the board and spells to crush your enemy's avatar.

Game for 2 players only.

Controls

Mouse

Development

The game is in its basic version. In next versions, an advanced mode will be added that will have the following features:

  • More tile cards
  • Unique special skill for each god
  • Tournament rules

Versions for Mac, Linux and Android will also be uploaded soon.

I'd be quite grateful if bugs are reported in comments, thanks.
